control_attributes.control_description: The organization: a. Establishes an alternate storage site including necessary agreements to permit the storage and retrieval of information system backup information; andb. Ensures that the alternate storage site provides information security safeguards equivalent to that of the primary site.

Control Statement: The organization: a. Establishes an alternate storage site including necessary agreements to permit the storage and retrieval of information system backup information; andb. Ensures that the alternate storage site provides information security safeguards equivalent to that of the primary site.
